19 template <class Base>
20 class TViewExtenderCompBase: public Base, virtual public IViewExtender
21 {
22 public:
23  typedef Base BaseClass;
24 
25  I_BEGIN_BASE_COMPONENT(TViewExtenderCompBase);
26  I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(IViewExtender);
27  I_ASSIGN(m_slaveExtenderCompPtr, "SlaveSceneExtender", "Scene extender will be used to provide background shapes", false, "SlaveSceneExtender");
28  I_ASSIGN(m_sceneExtenderModeAttrPtr, "ViewExtenderMode", "Control how the view extender works:\n\t0 - combine slave with current shapes\n\t1 - use slave by direct calls only\n\t2 - use slave always and current shapes indirect only\n\t3 - use slave by direct calls only and current shapes indirect only", true, 0);
29  I_ASSIGN_MULTI_0(m_idFiltersAttrPtr, "SceneIdFilters", "Optional scene ID filters allowing to ignore some scene providers", false);
30  I_END_COMPONENT;
31 
32  TViewExtenderCompBase();
33 
34  // reimplemented (iqt2d::IViewExtender)
35  virtual void AddItemsToScene(IViewProvider* providerPtr, int flags);
36  virtual void RemoveItemsFromScene(IViewProvider* providerPtr);
37 
38 protected:
39  enum ExtenderMode
40  {
41  EM_COMBINE,
42  EM_SLAVE_DIRECT_ONLY,
43  EM_OWN_SHAPES_INDIRECT,
44  EM_SLAVE_DIRECT_ONLY_OWN_SHAPES_INDIRECT
45  };
46 
47  typedef istd::TPointerVector<iview::IShape> Shapes;
48  typedef QMap<IViewProvider*, Shapes> ShapesMap;
49 
50  bool IsViewIdSupported(int viewId) const;
51  const ShapesMap& GetShapesMap() const;
52 
53  void UpdateAllViews();
54 
55  // abstract methods
60  virtual void CreateShapes(int viewId, Shapes& result) = 0;
61 
62 private:
63  ShapesMap m_shapesMap;
64  bool m_isSlaveShown;
65 
66  I_REF(IViewExtender, m_slaveExtenderCompPtr);
67  I_ATTR(int, m_sceneExtenderModeAttrPtr);
68  I_MULTIATTR(int, m_idFiltersAttrPtr);
69 
70  istd::TDelPtr<i2d::ICalibration2d> m_viewCalibrationPtr;
71 };

78 : m_isSlaveShown(false)

80 }

83 // reimplemented (iqt2d::IViewExtender)
84 
85 template <class Base>
86 void TViewExtenderCompBase<Base>::AddItemsToScene(IViewProvider* providerPtr, int flags)
87 {
88  Q_ASSERT(providerPtr != NULL);
89 
90  int viewId = providerPtr->GetViewId();
91  iview::IShapeView* viewPtr = providerPtr->GetView();
92 
93  bool showOwnShapes = true;
94  bool showSlaveShapes = true;
95 
96  switch (*m_sceneExtenderModeAttrPtr){
97  case EM_SLAVE_DIRECT_ONLY:
98  showSlaveShapes = ((flags & SF_DIRECT) != 0);
99  break;
100 
101  case EM_OWN_SHAPES_INDIRECT:
102  showOwnShapes = ((flags & SF_DIRECT) == 0);
103  break;
104 
105  case EM_SLAVE_DIRECT_ONLY_OWN_SHAPES_INDIRECT:
106  showOwnShapes = ((flags & SF_DIRECT) == 0);
107  showSlaveShapes = ((flags & SF_DIRECT) != 0);
108  break;
109 
110  default:
111  break;
112  };
113 
114 
115  if ( showOwnShapes &&
116  (viewPtr != NULL) &&
117  IsViewIdSupported(viewId) &&
118  (m_shapesMap.find(providerPtr) == m_shapesMap.end())){
119  Shapes& shapes = m_shapesMap[providerPtr];
120 
121  bool isBackground = ((flags & SF_BACKGROUND) != 0);
122  CreateShapes(viewId, shapes);
123 
124  int shapesCount = shapes.GetCount();
125  for (int i = 0; i < shapesCount; ++i){
126  iview::IShape* shapePtr = shapes.GetAt(i);
127  if (shapePtr != NULL){
128  // If the shape should be placed in the scene background
129  // and is not already a background shape, move it to inactive layer:
130  if (isBackground && (shapePtr->GetLayerType() != iview::IViewLayer::LT_BACKGROUND)){
131  iview::CShapeBase* shapeImplPtr = dynamic_cast<iview::CShapeBase*>(shapePtr);
132  if (shapeImplPtr != NULL){
133  shapeImplPtr->AssignToLayer(iview::IViewLayer::LT_INACTIVE);
134  }
135  }
136 
137  viewPtr->ConnectShape(shapePtr);
138  }
139  }
140  }
141 
142  if (showSlaveShapes && m_slaveExtenderCompPtr.IsValid()){
143  m_slaveExtenderCompPtr->AddItemsToScene(providerPtr, (flags | SF_BACKGROUND) & ~SF_DIRECT);
144 
145  m_isSlaveShown = true;
146  }
147  else{
148  m_isSlaveShown = false;
149  }
150 }
151 
152 
153 template <class Base>
154 void TViewExtenderCompBase<Base>::RemoveItemsFromScene(IViewProvider* providerPtr)
155 {
156  Q_ASSERT(providerPtr != NULL);
157 
158  if (m_isSlaveShown){
159  Q_ASSERT(m_slaveExtenderCompPtr.IsValid());
160 
161  m_slaveExtenderCompPtr->RemoveItemsFromScene(providerPtr);
162  }
163 
164  ShapesMap::iterator iter = m_shapesMap.find(providerPtr);
165  if (iter != m_shapesMap.end()){
166  iview::IShapeView* viewPtr = providerPtr->GetView();
167 
168  if (viewPtr != NULL){
169  Shapes& shapes = iter.value();
170 
171  int shapesCount = shapes.GetCount();
172  for (int i = 0; i < shapesCount; ++i){
173  iview::IShape* shapePtr = shapes.GetAt(i);
174  if (shapePtr != NULL){
175  viewPtr->DisconnectShape(shapePtr);
176  }
177  }
178  }
179 
180  m_shapesMap.erase(iter);
181  }
182 }
183 
184 
185 // protected methods
186 
187 template <class Base>
188 bool TViewExtenderCompBase<Base>::IsViewIdSupported(int viewId) const
189 {
190  if (m_idFiltersAttrPtr.IsValid()){
191  int filtersCount = m_idFiltersAttrPtr.GetCount();
192  for (int i = 0; i < filtersCount; ++i){
193  int filterId = m_idFiltersAttrPtr[i];
194  if (viewId == filterId){
195  return true;
196  }
197  }
198 
199  return false;
200  }
201 
202  return true;
203 }
204 
205 
206 template <class Base>
207 const typename TViewExtenderCompBase<Base>::ShapesMap& TViewExtenderCompBase<Base>::GetShapesMap() const
208 {
209  return m_shapesMap;
210 }
211 
212 
213 template <class Base>
214 void TViewExtenderCompBase<Base>::UpdateAllViews()
215 {
216  for (ShapesMap::iterator index = m_shapesMap.begin(); index != m_shapesMap.end(); index++){
217  IViewProvider* viewProvderPtr = index.key();
218  Q_ASSERT(viewProvderPtr != NULL);
219 
220  iview::IShapeView* viewPtr = viewProvderPtr->GetView();
221  Q_ASSERT(viewPtr != NULL);
222 
223  viewPtr->Update();
224  }
225 }
